projects.title: Nova Vista(Real Estate build house)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Real Estate Web App to help users search, filter, and view properties in a specific location.
 -  Search properties by various filters (location, price range, property type, etc.)View properties on an interactive map.
- User authentication (Sign-up/login for users).
 - Contact form for inquiries .

projects.title: Snapsy -  Twitter Clone
projects.bodyText:
-  Developed a Twitter-like clone to enable users to post tweets, follow/unfollow other users, like tweets, and interact with the platform in real-time.
 - User authentication (sign up, login).
 - Tweet creation, editing, and deletion.
 - Follow and unfollow users Real-time notifications (e.g., likes, retweets, follows) Like and retweet functionality .

projects.title: Schedule Management System
projects.bodyText:
-  Developed an Employee Management System (EMS) to manage employee records, roles, and departments. The system allows for creating, updating, deleting, and viewing employee information.
 - Employee CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete). 
 - Employee roles and departments management ,Employee performance tracking (leave management, salary details, etc.) .
 - Search and filter employees based on different criteria (name, role, department).
 - Authentication and authorization for admin and employee users .
